title: megacities video
about: Skate City, is a part of the megacities.world series. 81 satellite images of famous skate spots and skate parks are collaged into one skater's paradise.
text: Developed this AR to help viewers explore the Skate City World. Viewers explore and see through the Ar where all the different spots are in the artwork, a navigation is included with links to skate videos.
